title: Entry and inspection of facilities
context: [ยง342I-32] Entry and inspection of facilities. The department or other authorized party may enter and inspect any building or place, according to law at a reasonable time, for the purpose of: (1) Investigating an actual or suspected violation of this part; (2) Conducting reasonable tests; (3) Taking samples; and (4) Reviewing and copying records. [L 2000, c 173, pt of ยง1]
